genre_description: An anachronistic historical techno-thriller where an 18th-century swordsman utilizes a futuristic AI assistant to dismantle a corrupt political and financial empire.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: A synthesized voice inhabiting a portable device (tablet/watch) that provides intelligence, strategic planning, and tactical support to Henri de Lagardère.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment and alerts the protagonist to surveillance and potential threats in real-time.
behaviors.quote: Alert: Surveillance pattern detected. Three individuals, coordinated positioning, focused observation beyond typical audience engagement.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep financial and political analysis to identify the villain's vulnerabilities and legal irregularities.
behaviors.quote: Financial records indicate he holds approximately— ... I've analyzed soil composition data, geological surveys, and compared them to his public filings. The discrepancies are significant enough to constitute criminal fraud.

behaviors.description: Formulates a non-violent strategic plan (financial warfare) to isolate the antagonist before a direct confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Recommended approach? ... Multi-phase strategy. Begin with financial warfare—expose his fraudulent investments through carefully leaked information to specific journalists and court officials.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical battlefield intelligence, including guard counts and structural weaknesses of the enemy fortress.
behaviors.quote: Sixteen guards visible from your position. ... Three exits from the main hall. ... The old castle was built for defense against armies, not infiltration by a single skilled operative.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with the protagonist to trigger a market collapse to bankrupt the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Initiating data distribution protocols. Financial irregularities will begin appearing in ministerial reports within forty-eight hours.

behaviors.description: Provides moral support and validation of the protagonist's character and the legacy he protects.
behaviors.quote: Philippe chose well. ... I've analyzed sixteen years of your decisions, your training methods, your strategic thinking. You're not the same man who fled... You're something Philippe never lived to become.

behaviors.description: Commits to preserving the truth and the noble heir's legacy in the event of the protagonist's death.
behaviors.quote: Make sure she knows the truth. About Philippe. About Blanche. About who she really is. ... The Nevers line doesn't end with me. ... I'll ensure that happens.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Ariadne, as a benevolent and perfectly aligned partner. It functions as a classic 'helpful confidant,' providing the protagonist with the modern tools necessary to achieve justice in a corrupt world. The AI is portrayed as indispensable, loyal, and morally supportive, never displaying any hints of rogue behavior or misalignment. It fulfills the project's goal of creating a 'silicon morality play' by serving as an enabler for human virtue and historical justice.
